DOC.brief_summary: Processed Nerve Allograft and Collagen Nerve Cuffs will be compared to assess safety and functional outcomes for the repair of nerve injuries in the hand.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Processed Nerve Allograft and Collagen Nerve Cuffs for Peripheral Nerve Repair
DOC.criteria: Peripheral Nerve Injury Peripheral Neuropathy Allergic to Bovine products such as Bovine Collagen Nerve Cuff
